title: Reacting to the Biggest Stories from Week 8
description:
Today our hosts Wendi Nix, Sam Acho, and Greg McElroy are joined by David Hale and Bill Connelly to react and report on the most important stories from the past weekend. The crew discusses Clemson's quarterback situation and what their playoff chances are truly looking like considering their schedule. They also provide their takeaways from the LSU v Ole Miss matchup, who are having a midseason resurgence after a shaky start. Additionally, the crew looks into Mike Leach's interesting dinosaur remarks and Lane Kiffin's reaction. They rank the six undefeated teams left and take a quick look into next weeks matchups such as Penn State v Ohio State, and Georgia v Florida. We finish with a throwback story and interview with Mark Schlabaugh about his misbehaving, field-streaking dog -- Tubby.
